item.title: Selection Sort
item.description: Definition one of sort algorithms Technique Brute Force Algorithm steps find smallest number in the list swap the smallest number and first place the first element is sorted find smallest number in the list except the sorted element. swap the smallest number and second place Repeat 1~5 until all of them sorted. Example-Java public static int[] selectionSort(int[] input) { for (int i = 0; i < input.length - 1; ++i) { for (int j = input.
